Entries.Sat: Sometimes I wonder why I stay here...$s

Entries.winter_15.000: I have a checkup tomorrow... Maybe the mermaid show will calm my nerves? But what if they think I'm ogling... *gulp*
Entries.winter_16.000: I have a checkup today, so if you need to buy anything you'd better hurry.

Entries.winter_16.002: How do my lungs sound? Sometimes they make a rattling sound when I exhale.
Entries.winter_16.001: I'm seeing Maru about my lungs... breathing in all that coal dust can't be good.

Entries.winter_16.002: How do my lungs sound, Mag? Sometimes they make a rattling sound when I exhale.
Entries.winter_16.001: I'm seeing Magnus about my lungs... breathing in all that coal dust can't be good.
